DOC.brief_summary: A Multicenter study evaluation safety performance Spectranetics Laser Adjunct PTA Gore Viabahn Endoprosthesis Treatment SFA Instent Restenosis
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Safety Performance Spectranetics Laser w/Adjunct PTA Gore Viabahn Endoprosthesis Treatment SFA Instent Restenosis
DOC.criteria: Subject subject 's legal representative inform study nature . Subject understands duration study follow visit requirement . Intermittent claudication extend critical limb ischemia meeting Rutherford 25 category . Subject able walk unassisted . Female subject childbearing potential must negative serum pregnancy test 7 day prior treatment . Life expectancy le 12 month Myocardial infarction le 3 month prior procedure Known allergy sensitivities heparin , aspirin , anticoagulant/antiplatelet therapy nitinol . Known allergy contrast medium adequately premedicated prior study procedure . Uncontrolled hypercoagulability
DOC.keyword: treatment superficial femoral artery instent restenosis
